articles.content: President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy appears via remote during the opening ceremony of the 75th international film festival, Cannes, southern France, Tuesday, May 17, 2022. (Photo by Vianney Le C… [+6004 chars]

articles.title: Chris Hemsworth runs an unsettling futuristic prison in Spiderhead's first trailer - The Verge
articles.description: Netflix has released the first trailer for Spiderhead, a dark sci-fi comedy starring Chris Hemsworth, which starts streaming on June 17th.
articles.content: The film hits Netflix in June
